string.name: enabled
string.comment: user selects item as enabled

string.name: disabled
string.comment: user selects item as disabled

string.name: on
string.comment: on/off toggle switch, user switches item to ON

string.name: off
string.comment: on/off toggle switch, user switches item to OFF

string.name: YES
string.comment: yes/no toggle switch, user switches item to YES

string.name: NO
string.comment: yes/no toggle switch, user switches item to NO

string.name: insulin_U
string.comment: example: Bolus 5.5U

string.name: gram_g
string.comment: example: Food 25g

string.name: gram_exchange_ex
string.comment: example: Gram Exchange for Food, 15g = 1ex

string.name: day_d
string.comment: example: 10d (10 days)

string.name: hour_h
string.comment: example: 10h (10 hours)

string.name: minute_m
string.comment: example: 10m (10 minutes)

string.name: second_s
string.comment: example: 10s (10 seconds)

resources.string: Nightscout no debe ser usado para tomar decisiones médicas. No hay soporte ni garantía de ningún tipo. La calidad y el rendimiento del proyecto está en ti. Este es un proyecto creado y apoyado por voluntarios. Esto significa que aceptas que usar esta aplicación es bajo tu responsabilidad. Los desarrolladores de Nightscout no aceptan ninguna responsabilidad por las consecuencias de cualquier acción tomada sobre la base de la información proporcionada. Si no estás seguro de cómo usar esta aplicación no debes usarla.

string.name: main_screen__value_hour_chart
string.comment: example: '12 hour chart' '24 hour chart'

resources.string: No hay dispositivos Contour Next Link registrados
Para registrar un Contour Next Link primero debes enchufarlo y obtener una lectura de la bomba.

string.name: notification__SGV_value
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: SGV 100

string.name: notification__SGV_value_estimated
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, visible on pull down / lock screen when sensor glucose estimator is in use, example: SGV 100*

string.name: notification__SGV_not_available
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, visible on pull down / lock screen

string.name: notification__ESTIMATE
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen when sensor glucose estimator is in use

string.name: notification__NEXTPOLL_time
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Next 12:15 pm

string.name: notification__IOB_value
string.comment: IOB = Insulin On Board, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: IOB 3.5U

string.name: notification__BASAL_rate
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Basal: 0.85U

string.name: notification__SUSPEND
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example

string.name: notification__SUSPEND_time
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Suspended at 3.30 pm

string.name: notification__TEMPBASAL_rate_remainingtime
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Temp Basal: 0.15U 45m remain

string.name: notification__TEMPBASAL_rate_remainingtime_preset
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Temp Basal: 0.15U 45m remain (Temp 2)

string.name: notification__BG_value_time
string.comment: BG = Blood Glucose, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: BG: 120 at 3:15 pm

string.name: notification__BG_value_time_factor
string.comment: BG = Blood Glucose, Factor = Calibration Factor, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: BG: 120 at 3:15 pm • Factor: 4.5

string.name: notification__BOLUS_delivered_time
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Bolus: 3.5U at 3.15 pm

string.name: notification__DUALBOLUS_delivered_duration_time
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Dual: 3U:5U/1h30m at 3.15 pm

string.name: notification__SQUAREBOLUS_delivered_duration_time
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Square: 5U/1h30m at 3.15 pm

string.name: notification__BOLUSING_delivered_remainingtime
string.comment: visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Bolusing 0.5U 1h30m remain

string.name: notification__CAL_remainingtime
string.comment: time remaining until calibration is due, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Cal 10h30m

string.name: notification__WARMUP_remainingtime
string.comment: time remaining until calibration is due, visible on pull down / lock screen, example: Warmup 1h30m

string.name: notification__BUSY
string.comment: pump polling is in progress, visible on pull down / lock screen

string.name: notification__ERROR
string.comment: error state, visible on pull down / lock screen

resources.string: Error validación pushover. Compruebe que su cuenta Pushover está activa y la configuración es correcta.

string.name: ul_poll__rssi
string.comment: RSSI = Received Signal Strength Indicator (CNL-PUMP radio signal)

resources.string: Bomba esperando comunicación con sensor. Carga en
No se pudo comunicar con la bomba. ¿Está cerca?
Carga no pudo completarse. Se intentará de nuevo en 60 segundos.
sensor está en fase de iniciación

string.name: ul_poll__estimated_sgv
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, example: estimated SGV 120 at 3:15

string.name: ul_poll__reading_sgv__SGV
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, example: SGV 120 at 3:15 Pump +1m30s

string.name: ul_poll__reading_time__at
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, example: SGV 120 at 3:15 Pump +1m30s

string.name: ul_poll__reading_pump_clock_difference__Pump
string.comment: SGV = Sensor Glucose Value, example: SGV 120 at 3:15 Pump +1m30s

resources.string: Tiempo de carga incrementado, procesamiento histórico reducido.
Intervalo de sondeo de batería baja:
por delante de la hora utilizada por el cargador.
por detrás de la hora utilizada por el cargador.
Teléfono/dispositivo de carga debe tener la hora proporcionada por la red. El reloj de la bomba avanza y necesita configurarse a la hora correcta.
Prueba:desconectar y reconectar Contour Next Link al teléfono / reiniciar teléfono / comprobar enlace de CNL con bomba.
Warning: SGV de bomba no disponible a menudo. La bomba está perdiendo transmisiones del sensor.
Bomba siempre mismo lado que sensor. Evite usar ubicaciones del sensor que puedan bloquear señal.
Warning: conexión con bomba está fallando.
Bomba siempre cerca teléfono/dispositivo de carga. El cuerpo bloquea la señal entre bomba y cargador.
Warning: señal de radio RSSI de bomba es débil y puede aumentar los errores.
Bomba siempre cerca teléfono/dispositivo de carga. El cuerpo bloquea la señal entre bomba y cargador.
Error tiempo comunicación con Contour Next Link.
Checksum error al obtener mensaje de Contour Next Link.
Error descifrando mensajes de Contour Next Link.
Error conectando Contour Next Link: Error de Hashing.
Bomba con error de dispositivo. No se pueden leer datos hasta que error se borre en bomba.
Error de integridad. Time mismatch en Bbdd.
Error de integridad. BBDD contiene registros más allá de hora actual.
User has not granted permission for USB.
No permission to read the USB device.
It appears that this device does not support USB OTG.
USB connection error. Is the Contour Next Link plugged in?
Unplug/plug the Contour Next Link. Select \'use by default for this device\'.
Careportal is not enabled in Nightscout, treatment data can not be uploaded.
Add \'careportal\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku. Treatments can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.
Time difference between uploader device and Nightscout server is greater then 10 minutes.
Check the time on your uploader device. Set device to use network provided time.
Your version of the Nightscout server is out of date. It is recommended to use the latest release version of the Nightscout server with the 600 Series Uploader.
Pump status information can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'pump\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku.

Sensor changes are detected and sent to Nightscout. Add \'sage\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku to see time of last change. This can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.

Cannula changes are detected and sent to Nightscout. Add \'cage\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku to see time of last change. This can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.

Insulin changes are detected and sent to Nightscout. Add \'iage\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku to see time of last change. This can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.

Pump Battery changes are detected and sent to Nightscout. Add \'bage\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku to see time of last change. This can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.
Basal Profiles are sent to Nightscout. Add \'profile\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku. This can be disabled in the \'Advanced Nightscout Settings\' menu.
Basal rates profiles and pattern changes can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'basal\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku.
IOB active insulin can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'iob\' to your ENABLE string in Azure or Heroku.
Pump status details can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'DEVICESTATUS_ADVANCED\' with value \'true\' to your strings in Azure or Heroku.

Pump battery, insulin, delivery modes, calibration and active error alert can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'PUMP_FIELDS\' with value \'clock reservoir battery status\' to your strings in Azure or Heroku.
Bolus delivery modes, error alerts and calibration time can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'status\' to your \'PUMP_FIELDS\' string in Azure or Heroku.
Units of insulin remaining in the pump can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'reservoir\' to your \'PUMP_FIELDS\' string in Azure or Heroku.
Pump battery percentage remaining can be shown in Nightscout. Add \'battery\' to your \'PUMP_FIELDS\' string in Azure or Heroku.
Time since last pump reading can shown on Nightscout. Add \'clock\' to your \'PUMP_FIELDS\' string in Azure or Heroku.
API Secret must be 12 characters or longer.
El texto excede la longitud máxima
Values are shown and set in mg/dL
Values are shown and set in mmol/L
Polling interval on low pump battery
Enable upload of data to Nightscout
The hostname of your Nightscout site
Click here to scan QR-Code from http://nightscout.github.io/pages/configure/ using ZXing barcode scanner.
Enable local broadcast of data to xDrip+
Send Device Status updates to Nightscout
Send pump status and iob to Nightscout
Send finger BG readings to Nightscout
Add factor to BG readings used for calibration (additional calibration graph will be visible in SAGE)
Send pump battery changes to Nightscout (BAGE)
Add lifetime estimate to pump consumables
Upload profiles to Nightscout with basal patterns, carb ratios, sensitivity and targets
Only use a single profile group in nightscout (note: obsolete groups will be removed)
Uploaded profile will be valid from 12 months ago
Send basal pattern changes to Nightscout
Send pump alarms, alerts, reminders and status info to Nightscout
Full extended message as shown on the pump
Time taken to react to alarm on the pump
Send uploader status alerts and info to Nightscout
Send uploader USB error (disconnected) alerts to Nightscout
Uploader status messages are automatically removed from Nightscout after 24 hours
Send pump daily totals to Nightscout
Use Medtronic style trend arrows (may be incompatible with some follower apps)
Insert BG readings into CGM chart (helps Nightscout to show treatments when no CGM is in use)
Calculate an estimated SGV when a calibration is missed (warning: calculation is based on the last pump calibration point and may be unreliable)
Report ISIG when SGV is not available from the pump and CGM is in use.
No protection, always run a poll request
Delay a poll request when pump is expecting sensor communication

string.name: pref_system_rssi_allow_connection_title
string.comment: do not allow a pump connection when RSSI signal is less then this minimum

resources.string: A poll will trigger based on the expected sensor event time plus a conditional state period (warning: changing these settings can lead to radio clashes and extended lost sensor periods)
Use system defaults for all poll timing
Sends usage data to the developer to help develop a better app.
Allow the developer to debug your app. Only enable if asked to by the support team.
Detailed errors and polling data shown in the userlog
Report Nightscout uploading errors in the userlog

Nightscout should not be used to make medical decisions. There is no support or any warranty of any kind. The quality and performance of the project is with you. This is a project that was created and is supported completely by volunteers
Local broadcast of data to Urchin allowing full offline viewing of SGV and extended Pump status information
Basal can be graphed with heights relative to the period selected and scaled to the value selected.
Mark a bolus event on graph.
Square/Dual bolus tags in status text.
A Square or Dual bolus can be popped to the height selected and shown on the basal graph during delivery period.
Alerts and Events to any device
Send push notifications for pump alerts and events to any device using Pushover. Download the Pushover app on your follower device from the App Store.
Alarms and alerts that have not been acknowledged and cleared by the pump user can have a notification sent to followers.

EMERGENCY: red notification & sound (persistent alarm that must be aknowledged by follower)&newline;HIGH: red notification & sound&newline;NORMAL: notification & sound&newline;LOW: notification & no sound&newline;LOWEST: no notification & no sound (message can be viewed in the Pushover app/widget)
Listen to the available notification sounds.
Note: Some pump emergency alerts can block all communication until they are cleared by the pump user. Alert for this state can be set in \'Uploader Events\'
Alerts that require immediate action. Example: \'Insulin flow blocked\' \'Replace battery now\'
Alerts that may require action. Example: \'Calibrate Now\' \'Bolus Not Delivered\'
Treatments and events can have a notification sent to followers.
Send Uploader status events to followers.
Some pump errors can block all communication until they are cleared by the pump user. Notify follower when pump is in this state.
When the Contour Next Link is unplugged.
Full extended message as shown on the pump
Include the time in the title part of a notification
Include custom text in the title part of a notification
Alerts that were not active at time of polling and have already been cleared by the pump user are available after history has been retrieved for other live events.
When a active alert notification has been sent to a follower, always send another message to show when this alert has been acknowledged and cleared on the pump.
Silenced unacknowledged sensor alerts can be sent to followers. Pump will stay quiet and follower will be alerted.
Change message priority and sound when pump issues a silent alert.
Only backfill from the time the uploader or device has been started/restarted.
Do not backfill messages when a CNL meter has been unplugged for longer then this amount of time.
Messages older then this age can have their priority and sound changed.
Use a Pushover device name to send the message directly to that device, rather than all of the users devices (multiple devices may be separated by a comma)
Low glucose auto resume - max suspend period
Low glucose auto resume - preset glucose reached
Low glucose manual resume via disable
Into active due to sensor calibration
Out of active due to user override
Out of active due to alarm
Out of active due to timeout from safe basal
Out of active due to prolonged high SG

resources.string: USB Error. Contour Next Link disconnected.
Pump has a device error. No data can be read until this error has been cleared on the Pump.
